thread.title: Buddhist monks congregate for prayer and light ceremony
thread.title_full: Buddhist monks congregate for prayer and light ceremony

title: Buddhist monks congregate for prayer and light ceremony
text: show ad Silent light: Stunning images capture 1,250 Buddhist monks congregating for hushed annual prayer and lantern lighting ceremony in Thailand Makha Bucha Day is a celebration of Buddha's teachings in the third lunar month of the Buddhist calendar This year 1250 monks gathered to be 'ordained by the Buddha' and take part in lantern lighting ceremony It is one of the most important holidays in the Thai calendar and finalised with haunting candlelight ceremony
